trans-unit.source: Specifies the impersonation behavior for a service operation on a service instance.
trans-unit.target: Angir virkemåten for representasjon for en tjenesteoperasjon på en forekomst av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Use the ImpersonationOption enumeration to control impersonation in [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ImpersonationOption-nummerering for kontrollen representasjonen i [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programmer.

trans-unit.source: This setting interacts with a configuration property on <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A> in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Denne innstillingen samhandler med en konfigurasjonsegenskapen på <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A>i følgende tabell.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A>

trans-unit.source: Impersonation is performed if credentials are available and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*> is equal to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representasjonen utføres hvis legitimasjonen er tilgjengelig og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>er lik <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*> is equal to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, a validation exception occurs at service startup time.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>er lik <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, det oppstår et unntak for validering gangen for oppstart.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>
